Class PowerUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.PowerUp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GridMember, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtraBullet, Invincibility, Radar

    public abstract class PowerUp
extends java.lang.Object
implements GridMember, java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean isUsed
      This boolean determines if the powerup is picked by the player or not.
      private boolean seen
      This boolean determines if the powerup is seen by the player or not.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PowerUp() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSeen()
      This method returns the value of seen
      boolean isSomething()
      The isSomething method is a boolean that is anything that exists on the grid with the exception of the empty member object.
      boolean isUsed()
      The isUsed method returns the value of the boolean isUsed, and checks if the powerup has been picked up or not.
      void powerGain()
      This method sets the isUsed boolean value to true, which means the powerup has been picked up.
      void resetSee()
      The resetSee method will change everything that isSeen to false, this is here to make sure the player doesn't have sight on something they're not supposed to.
      void see()
      This method makes the powerup visible to the player.

      • isSomething

        public boolean isSomething()
        The isSomething method is a boolean that is anything that exists on the grid with the exception of the empty member object. The object being something makes it easier to interact with one another when the player moves into something.
        Specified by:
        isSomething in interface GridMember

      • resetSee

        public void resetSee()
        The resetSee method will change everything that isSeen to false, this is here to make sure the player doesn't have sight on something they're not supposed to.
        Specified by:
        resetSee in interface GridMember

      • powerGain

        public void powerGain()
        This method sets the isUsed boolean value to true, which means the powerup has been picked up.

      • isUsed

        public boolean isUsed()
        The isUsed method returns the value of the boolean isUsed, and checks if the powerup has been picked up or not.
